sentence.Network_en: The economic gloom of the early 1980s was relieved by fanciful architecture.
sentence.Network_cn: 20世纪80年代初期的经济萧条气氛因各种奇异古怪建筑的出现而有所缓解。

sentence.Network_en: The party leader has been relieved of his post.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个党的领导人被免除了职务。

sentence.Network_en: A porter relieved her of the three large cases.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个行李搬运工替她扛了3个大包。

PerfectNetExp.abs: I felt safe and relieved in my ideal anime virtual life ., 我感觉很安全 , 安心地生活在我的理想动画虚幻生活中.
《Friends》词汇表A ... mopping n. 拖把(俗称地拖), 洗碗v.用拖把拖洗, 擦, 抹, 扫荡 relieved 放心的 ouch int. 哎唷！痛呀！.
We feel both sentimental and relieved of our love - hate relationship with paper ., 终于要结束与纸张这种既爱又恨的关系 , 我们不免有点伤感 , 又有点释然.
词汇控 - 人人小站 ... 愉快的： pleasurable 宽慰的： relieved 知足的： satisfying.

list.abs: 护士用的日常单词英语_百度知道 ... corridor n. 走道 relieve  vt 缓解 fill the prescription 抓药.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... （acro 高→ ) relieve v 减轻；解除 ) sublime a 崇高的.
医学词汇（Q-R）--上海翻译公司-021-58377363 ... relieve 减轻，替换，解除 reliever 减压装置，解脱器 remaining needle 留置针.

entry.tran: 感到宽慰的;感到安心的;宽心的
entry.def: If you are relieved, you feel happy because something unpleasant has not happened or is no longer happening.

example.ex: We are all relieved to be back home...
example.tran: 回到家里我们都感到安心了。

example.ex: I am very relieved that it is over...
example.tran: 这件事结束之后我感到轻松极了。

means.word_mean: 1. (of pain or sorrow) made easier to bear

auth_sentence.content: He said he is relieved the drama is over.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said he is relieved the drama is over.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said he is relieved the drama is over.

auth_sentence.content: That's not actually something to be relieved about.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's not actually something to be relieved about.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's not actually something to be relieved about.

auth_sentence.content: Relieved, Raffles returned to his routine administrative duties.
auth_sentence.res_content: Relieved, Raffles returned to his routine administrative duties.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Relieved, Raffles returned to his routine administrative duties.

Sentence.sentence: She said it relieved her feelings.

sentences.en: I am relieved to hear that this isn’t true.
sentences.cn: 听到这不是真的,我感到宽心了。

sentences.en: I was relieved to see that he seemed almost himself again.
sentences.cn: 看到他又恢复理智,我总算放心了。

sentences.en: Having gone a long time without scoring,he was relieved to find the net again.
sentences.cn: 他好长时间没有得分,因而有了投篮的机会时觉得欣慰。
